page.title: 08MEDIA
page.content: {MEDIA.}Newspapers are published daily or weekly.Popular papers are the Daily Mail,Daily Express and The Sun.More informative papers are The Times,Telegraph and Guardian.Our local weekly paper is the Braintree and Witham Times.They are mostly printed in black and white.Free advertising newspapers are also delivered.Numerous magazines cover all hobbies and interests to suit all age groups. Comics are read for fun,the pictures tell the story for young children.The most famous are Beano and Dandy.Books for all ages can be borrowed from the library.A few books are sold by the Newsagents.There are a couple of antique book shops as well.T.V. and Radio give frequent news bulletins and programmes.Many families also have video recorders; you have to buy a licence to have these receivers.
